directions.d: Spread cream cheese into jalapeno pepper halves.
Wrap each with a piece of bacon.
Arrange wrapped jalapeno peppers onto a baking sheet with cream cheese side facing down.
Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat, and lightly oil the grate.
Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes.
Turn and continue cooking until the bacon is completely browned, about 10 minutes.
Transfer jalapeno wraps to preheated grill.
Cook until the bacon is crisp, 2 to 3 minutes per side.
